A C D E G H I M P Q R S T U W

A

AuthorizeCallback - class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.AuthorizeCallback.
This callback is used by SaslServer to determine whether one entity (identified by an authenticated authentication id) can act on behalf of another entity (identified by an authorization id).
AuthorizeCallback(String, String) - Constructor for class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.AuthorizeCallback
Constructs an instance of AuthorizeCallback.

C

CLIENT_PKGS - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of the property that specifies the SaslClientFactorys to use.
com.sun.security.sasl.preview - package com.sun.security.sasl.preview
Contains class and interfaces for supporting SASL.
createSaslClient(String[], String, String, String, Map, CallbackHandler) - Static method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
Creates a SaslClient using the parameters supplied.
createSaslClient(String[], String, String, String, Map, CallbackHandler) - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslClientFactory
Creates a SaslClient using the parameters supplied.
createSaslServer(String, String, String, Map, CallbackHandler) - Static method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
Creates a SaslServer for the specified mechanism.
createSaslServer(String, String, String, Map, CallbackHandler) - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServerFactory
Creates a SaslServer using the parameters supplied.

D

dispose() - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslClient
Disposes of any system resources or security-sensitive information the SaslClient might be using.
dispose() - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServer
Disposes of any system resources or security-sensitive information the SaslServer might be using.

E

Evaluates the challenge data and generates a response.
evaluateResponse(byte[]) - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServer
Evaluates the response data and generates a challenge.

G

Returns the authentication id to check.

Reports the authorization ID in effect for the client of this session.

Returns the authorization id to check.
getAuthorizedID() - Method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.AuthorizeCallback
Returns the id of the authorized user.
getCause() - Method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException
Returns the cause of this throwable or null if the cause is nonexistent or unknown.

Returns the IANA-registered mechanism name of this SASL client.
getMechanismName() - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServer
Returns the IANA-registered mechanism name of this SASL server.

Returns an array of names of mechanisms that match the specified mechanism selection policies.

H

hasInitialResponse() - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslClient
Determines whether this mechanism has an optional initial response.

I

isAuthorized() - Method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.AuthorizeCallback
Determines whether the authentication id is allowed to act on behalf of the authorization id.
isComplete() - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslClient
Determines whether the authentication exchange has completed.
isComplete() - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServer
Determines whether the authentication exchange has completed.

M

MAX_BUFFER - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies the maximum size of the receive buffer in bytes of SaslClient/SaslServer.

P

POLICY_FORWARD_SECRECY - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies whether mechanisms that implement forward secrecy between sessions are required.
POLICY_NOACTIVE - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies whether mechanisms susceptible to active (non-dictionary) attacks are not permitted.
POLICY_NOANONYMOUS - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies whether mechanisms that accept anonymous login are not permitted.
POLICY_NODICTIONARY - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies whether mechanisms susceptible to passive dictionary attacks are not permitted.
POLICY_NOPLAINTEXT - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies whether mechanisms susceptible to simple plain passive attacks (e.g., "PLAIN") are not permitted.
POLICY_PASS_CREDENTIALS - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies whether mechanisms that pass client credentials are required.
printStackTrace() - Method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException
Prints this exception's stack trace to System.err.
printStackTrace(PrintStream) - Method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException
Prints this exception's stack trace to a print stream.
printStackTrace(PrintWriter) - Method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException
Prints this exception's stack trace to a print writer.

Q

QOP - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies the quality-of-protection to use.

R

RAW_SEND_SIZE - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies the maximum size of the raw send buffer in bytes of SaslClient/SaslServer.
RealmCallback - class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.RealmCallback.
This callback is used by SaslClient and SaslServer to retrieve realm information.
RealmCallback(String) - Constructor for class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.RealmCallback
Constructs a RealmCallback with a prompt.
RealmCallback(String, String) - Constructor for class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.RealmCallback
Constructs a RealmCallback with a prompt and default realm information.
RealmChoiceCallback - class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.RealmChoiceCallback.
This callback is used by SaslClient and SaslServer to obtain a realm given a list of realm choices.
RealmChoiceCallback(String, String[], int, boolean) - Constructor for class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.RealmChoiceCallback
Constructs a RealmChoiceCallback with a prompt, a list of choices and a default choice.

S

Sasl - class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl.
A static class for creating SASL clients and servers.
SaslClient - interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslClient.
Performs SASL authentication as a client.
SaslClientFactory - interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslClientFactory.
An interface for creating instances of SaslClient.
SaslException - exception com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException.
This class represents an error that has occurred when using SASL.
SaslException() - Constructor for class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException
Constructs a new instance of SaslException.
SaslException(String) - Constructor for class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException
Constructs a new instance of SaslException with a detailed message.
SaslException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException
Constructs a new instance of SaslException with a detailed message and a root exception.
SaslServer - interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServer.
Performs SASL authentication as a server.
SaslServerFactory - interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServerFactory.
An interface for creating instances of SaslServer.
SERVER_AUTH - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies whether the server must authenticate to the client.
SERVER_PKGS - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of the property that specifies the SaslServerFactorys to use.

Sets whether the authorization is allowed.
setAuthorizedID(String) - Method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.AuthorizeCallback
Sets the id of the authorized entity.

Sets the default SaslClientFactory to use.
setSaslServerFactory(SaslServerFactory) - Static method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
Sets the default SaslServerFactory to use.
STRENGTH - Static variable in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.Sasl
The name of a property that specifies the cipher strength to use.

T

toString() - Method in class com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslException

U

unwrap(byte[], int, int) - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslClient
Unwraps a byte array received from the server.
unwrap(byte[], int, int) - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServer
Unwraps a byte array received from the client.

W

wrap(byte[], int, int) - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslClient
Wraps a byte array to be sent to the server.
wrap(byte[], int, int) - Method in interface com.sun.security.sasl.preview.SaslServer
Wraps a byte array to be sent to the client.
